mapper.select: select nation, count(nation) from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) group by nation
select db_name, count(db_name) from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and nation=#{nation} group by db_name
select sector, count(sector) from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and db_name=#{db_name} group by sector
select name, stock_code from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and sector=#{sector}
SELECT STOCK_CODE FROM AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and name = #{name}
SELECT name FROM addition where id=#{id} WHERE nation=#{nation} AND db_name=#{db_name} AND sector=#{sector} AND name=#{name} AND stock_code=#{stock_code}
SELECT * FROM AvailableData A INNER JOIN addition ON A.stock_code = addition.stock_code WHERE addition.id = #{id}
